Posts.Content: I Had a mx April 25th Â and since then i have had shooting pains in the breast I no Longer have. I have been assured this is normal. But I havent had reconstruction yet, I think it may have something to do with the nerves growing back..But if your worried get in touch with whoever did your reconstruction,they may be able to put your mind at rest . smiler
Posts.Title: phantom or coincidental pain
